title: How to Make a Non Drivable Vehicle Drivable in Garry's Mod

steps.headline: Spawn a prop vehicle.
steps.description: It can also be a simple prop, for example, a bathtub.

steps.headline: Spawn a jeep vehicle (which is drivable).
Use the "No Collide" tool on both of the spawned things.
Put the jeep on the top of the prop with the physics gun.
Weld them both with each other.
Go to the "Colour" tool and slide all of the bars to the very bottom.
Paint the jeep with the colour.
Unfreeze the vehicle and the prop.
Walk to the prop and press the use button.
steps.description: Walk around it while pressing the button until you get into the "car".

text: Spawn a prop vehicle. It can also be a simple prop, for example, a bathtub. Spawn a jeep vehicle (which is drivable).  Use the "No Collide" tool on both of the spawned things.  Put the jeep on the top of the prop with the physics gun.  Weld them both with each other.  Go to the "Colour" tool and slide all of the bars to the very bottom.  Paint the jeep with the colour.  Unfreeze the vehicle and the prop.  Walk to the prop and press the use button. Walk around it while pressing the button until you get into the "car".
